程序包 com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

类 ViewProfileActivity.DownloadImageTask

java.lang.Object
android.os.AsyncTask<String,Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.ViewProfileActivity.DownloadImageTask
封闭类:
ViewProfileActivity
public class ViewProfileActivity.DownloadImageTask extends android.os.AsyncTask<String,Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
Asynchronous task for downloading and displaying an image from a URL. It is used here to load and display the attendee's profile image.

  • 嵌套类概要

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DownloadImageTask

      public DownloadImageTask(android.widget.ImageView bmImage)
      Constructs an instance of the DownloadImageTask with the specified ImageView.
      参数:
      bmImage - The ImageView where the downloaded image will be displayed.

  • 方法详细资料

    • doInBackground

      protected android.graphics.Bitmap doInBackground(String... urls)
      Downloads the image from the provided URL in the background. This method runs on a separate thread to prevent blocking the UI thread.
      指定者:
      doInBackground 在类中 android.os.AsyncTask<String,Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      参数:
      urls - The array of URLs to download the image from. Only the first URL in the array is used.
      返回:
      The downloaded bitmap image, or null if the download fails.

    • onPostExecute

      protected void onPostExecute(android.graphics.Bitmap result)
      Runs on the UI thread after the background computation finishes. Sets the downloaded image bitmap to the ImageView provided in the constructor.
      覆盖:
      onPostExecute 在类中 android.os.AsyncTask<String,Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      参数:
      result - The bitmap image downloaded by doInBackground(String...).
